Evacuees from the China coronavirus outbreak toss their masks after finishing quarantine in Riverside, California, February 11. Riverside University Health Department - via REUTERS

Family members of passengers onboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess, where dozens of passengers were tested positive for coronavirus, wave and talk to them on the phone in Yokohama, Japan, February 11. REUTERS/Issei Kato

Vietnamese people repatriated from the Chinese city of Wuhan wearing protective suits arrive at Van Don airport, Quang Ninh province, Vietnam, February 10. REUTERS/Stringer

A device that sprays disinfectant on people entering a residential compound is seen at its entrance, in Tianjin, China, February 11. cnsphoto via REUTERS

A volunteer wearing a face mask inside a tent at a medical observation site in a residential compound in Neijiang, Sichuan province, China, February 10. China Daily via REUTERS

A man wearing a face mask keeps watch at an entrance to a residential community fenced in with temporary barriers, in Yichang city of Hubei, the Chinese province hit hardest by the coronavirus outbreak, February 10. China Daily via REUTERS

Traders wearing face masks are seen on the trading floor at a flower auction in Kunming, Yunnan province, China, February 10. cnsphoto via REUTERS

Chinese President Xi Jinping inspects the coronavirus prevention and control work at Anhuali Community in Beijing, China, February 10. Xinhua via REUTERS

A medical worker in a protective suit at an isolated ward of a hospital in Wuhan, Hubei province, China, February 6. China Daily via REUTERS

People wear protective masks as they wait to cross the street in Hong Kong, February 10. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu

Customers wearing face masks shop inside a supermarket in Wuhan, Hubei province, China, February 10. China Daily via REUTERS

An employee wearing a face mask walks through a device that sprays disinfectant at an entrance to a company in Chongqing, China, February 10. cnsphoto via REUTERS

Philippine residents, voluntarily evacuated due to the coronavirus outbreak, board a plane from Wuhan, China, February 9. Courtesy of Department of Foreign Affairs/via REUTERS

Medical workers in protective suits move a patient inside an isolated ward of a hospital in Wuhan, Hubei province, China, February 6. China Daily via REUTERS

A worker in a protective suit is seen at a medical waste disposal center in Chengdu, Sichuan province, China, February 8. cnsphoto via REUTERS

A staff member checks temperature of an employee entering a JD.com's 7Fresh chain before the store opens, in Yizhuang town, Beijing, China, February 8. REUTERS/Tingshu Wang

Canadians evacuated from China due to the outbreak of coronavirus, who had left Wuhan on an U.S. plane which then transferred them in Vancouver, arrive at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton in Ontario, Canada, February 7. REUTERS/Carlos Osorio

A bride wearing a mask for protection attends a mass wedding ceremony of the Unification Church at Cheongshim Peace World Centre in Gapyeong, South Korea, February 7. REUTERS/Heo Ran

A person wearing a mask attend a vigil for late Li Wenliang, an ophthalmologist who died of coronavirus at a hospital in Wuhan, in Hong Kong, China, February 7. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu

A passenger wearing a face mask stretches in his cabin on the cruise ship Diamond Princess, where dozens of passengers tested positive for coronavirus, at Daikoku Pier Cruise Terminal in Yokohama, south of Tokyo, Japan, February 7.

A deliveryman rides on a street at Sanlitun area in Beijing, China, February 7. REUTERS/Jason Lee

A girl wears a mask as a preventive measure against the coronavirus outbreak, in Bangkok, Thailand, February 7. REUTERS/Soe Zeya Tun

A child waves as she sits in a vehicle carrying residents evacuated from a public housing building at Cheung Hong Estate in Hong Kong, February 11. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu

The Royal Caribbean cruise ship Anthem of the Seas is docked after passengers were removed with possible coronavirus symptoms at the port of Bayonne, New Jersey, February 7. REUTERS/Bryan R Smith

A man in a protective suit works on disinfecting the aircraft cabin for a Hainan Airlines flight at the Haikou Meilan International Airport in Haikou, Hainan province, China, February 7. cnsphoto via REUTERS

A family of evacuees are seen walking at the Christmas Island Immigration Detention Centre, where evacuees who arrived from China's Wuhan city are quarantined, on Christmas Island, Australia, February 5. AAP Image/Richard Wainwright/via REUTERS

Medical staff members walking towards a military plane, which evacuated citizens of Russia and ex-Soviet countries from China's Wuhan province, at the Roshchino International Airport outside Tyumen, Russia, February 5. Yuri Shestak/Vsluh.

A medical worker holds a thermometer to check a passenger's temperature at a checkpoint in Susong County, Anhui province, China, February 6. REUTERS/Thomas Peter

Passengers with face masks and bathrobes look out from a cabin of the World Dream cruise ship, after it had been denied entry in Taiwan amid concerns of coronavirus infection on board, at the Kai Tak Cruise Terminal in Hong Kong, China, February 6,

Medical workers in protective suits attend to patients at the Wuhan International Conference and Exhibition Center, which has been converted into a makeshift hospital to receive patients with mild symptoms caused by the coronavirus, in Wuhan, Hubei

The World Dream cruise which had been denied entry in Taiwan amid concerns of coronavirus infection on board, is seen docked at the Kai Tak Cruise Terminal in Hong Kong, China, February 5. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu

Police officers operate a drone to spread information about the prevention and control of the coronavirus, in Baokang county, Xiangyang, Hubei province, China, February 4. China Daily via REUTERS

People queue up for free surgical masks from a convenience store in Hong Kong, China, February 7. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu

A resident wearing mask and raincoat volunteers to take temperature of passenger following the outbreak of a new coronavirus at a bus stop at Tin Shui Wai, a border town in Hong Kong, China February 4. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu

A worker sets up beds at the Hongshan Stadium to convert it into a makeshift hospital following an outbreak of the new coronavirus, in Wuhan, Hubei province, China February 4, 2020. China Daily via REUTERS

A man wears a protective face mask with a character design inside a jeepney, following two confirmed cases of coronavirus in the country, in Quezon City, Metro Manila, Philippines, February 4. REUTERS/Eloisa Lopez

A man wearing a mask walks through closed stores in Shanghai, China, as the country is hit by an outbreak of a new coronavirus, February 4. REUTERS/Aly Song

A man arrives from Hubei province at a checkpoint at the Jiujiang Yangtze River Bridge as the country is hit by an outbreak of the novel coronavirus, in Jiujiang, Jiangxi province, China, February 4. REUTERS/Thomas Peter

A medical worker in a protective suit adjusts a drip bag for a patient at a hospital, following an outbreak of the new coronavirus in Wuhan, Hubei province, China February 3. China Daily via REUTERS

A volunteer in protective suits controls a drone to spray disinfectants at Zhengwan village, as the country is hit by an outbreak of the new coronavirus, in Handan, Hebei province, China January 31. China Daily via REUTERS

Medical officers spray Indonesian nationals with antiseptic after they arrived from Wuhan, China, before transferring them to be quarantined, at Hang Nadim Airport in Batam, Indonesia, February 2. Antara Foto/via REUTERS

Volunteers in protective suits deliver daily necessities to those under self-quarantine at home, at a village in Zouping, Shandong province, China, February 1. China Daily via REUTERS

Portuguese nationals who were in the coronavirus-stricken Chinese city of Wuhan arrive at Figo Maduro military airbase in Lisbon, Portugal, February 2. Mario Cruz/Pool via REUTERS

An aerial view shows the newly completed Huoshenshan Hospital, a dedicated hospital built in 8 days to treat coronavirus patients, in Wuhan, China, February 2. China Daily via REUTERS

A mother reacts as she pleads with police to allow her daughter to pass a checkpoint for cancer treatment after she arrived from Hubei province at the Jiujiang Yangtze River Bridge in Jiujiang, China, February 1. REUTERS/Thomas Peter

A person wearing a surgical mask is seen on the balcony at a hospital on the remote Spanish island of La Gomera, where the first case of coronavirus in the country has been confirmed, in La Gomera, Spain, February 1. REUTERS/Borja Suarez

A man wearing a face mask registers at a registration point set up by community members for people returning or leaving Beijing, in Beijing, China, February 1. REUTERS/Carlos Garcia Rawlins

A woman wears a protective mask walks at the Trocadero esplanade in front of the Eiffel Tower in Paris, France, February 1. REUTERS/Gonzalo Fuentes
